name: Slapdash (YC W19)
slogan: Work at the speed of thought
description:
Slapdash is the missing layer that unifies your work applications (G-Suite, Dropbox, GithHub, Asana, etc.) allowing you to search, organize and launch; just like you do with files on your computer.

We’re obsessed with speed, from building the fastest workflows to making our user experience latency-free.

team.title: CEO
team.name: Ivan Kanevski
team.bioHtml: Co-founder & CEO of @Slapdash (YC W19), Engineering Lead @Facebook , Designer

team.title: COO
team.name: Lester Lee
team.bioHtml: Co-founder & COO of @Slapdash (YC W19). Led Sales/Success @Lattice • Worked at @SurveyMonkey, @Microsoft, @CNET Networks, @Federated Media • Studied at Cal

jobs.title: Software Engineer - Full Stack
jobs.description:
Hello! We are a Y Combinator-backed company re-thinking how people work with cloud applications.

Slapdash is the missing layer that unifies your work applications (G-Suite, Dropbox, GithHub, Asana, etc.) allowing you to search, organize and launch; just like you do with files on your computer. 

We’re obsessed with speed, from building the fastest workflows to making our user experience latency-free.

We are building the engineering team to go from 0 to 1 and beyond.

Who we’re looking for

* Experienced, or highly-capable engineers, interested in novel technical challenges
* Creative and flexible problem solvers
* Engineers who love learning new things and do it all the time
* Empathetic communicators, entrepreneurial in spirit

What you’ll do

* Build brand new infrastructure with a focus on minimizing latency
* Own end-to-end development, from conception to production 
* Engineer not only solutions, but also tools to understand the problem
* Establish a fun, creative, world-class engineering culture as one of our very first hires

Why Slapdash

* Design something that you use every day
* An opportunity to invent and build the future of work
* Competitive salary, equity and benefits:  401(k), medical, dental, and vision insurance
* Work out of an airy loft in SoMa, within walking distance to BART and Caltrain

About Us

The company is founded by experienced technologists who have: started companies that exited, built massive engineering systems at Facebook and WhatsApp, designed products used by millions of people, and scaled revenue from $0 to millions many times over.

We just graduated from Y Combinator (Winter 2019), have an amazing set of investors, and are looking to bring on the founding team of engineers and designers.
